trends: There have been no other sightings in Lake Forest
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: disk shape, with 2 lights on end. hovered for duration then shot strait up
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: sighting detailsi was at the beach sitting by the water. i noticed the objected b\c of the dime greenish glow of its lights, it stood out against the black sky. i first thought it was a plane just passing above me. the object sudenly stoped in place and hovered for minutes then went in sharp angels always returning to the same spot. after 2 minutes or so of this it went strait up into the sky. i didnt know what to think or what i was seeing, i knew that some planes can hover but none could move is such sharp angels as this did. i then relized what i saw.i finaly lost sight when its glowing lights.
